TopicTitle: How do you start an engine?

Articles.Content: So I have a vehicle with a turboshaft engine. There's fuel on board, engine is engaged, air intakes open, torque and RPM are maxed. No rotation. What am I missing?
are you able to share a video of what you are doing?
There's a trick to it but I'm afraid I haven't tried this in so long I don't remember what it is. Something in the r-click menu on the motors, I think?
